title: List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Hertfordshire
summary: Hertfordshire is a county in eastern England. It is bordered by Bedfordshire to the north, Cambridgeshire to the north-east, Essex to the east, Buckinghamshire to the west and Greater London to the south. The county town is Hertford. As of 2018, the county has a population of 1,184,400[1] in an area of 634 square miles (1,640Â km2).[2]
